name: X-org-tuio-driver
tagline: X.org multitouch driver for TUIO trackers.
body:
The goal of this project is to create an X.org multitouch driver for TUIO trackers. MPX + Xinput2 are not in a release version of X.org yet, so at the moment a custom build is required. For more information go to my blog at (http://rhuffman.wordpress.com/)

Originally hosted [here](http://nuicode.com/projects/gsoc-mpx)
*** GSoC 2009 project
[![GSoC 2009](http://db.tt/Uai2WuQE)](http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2009)
**Student:** Ryan Huffman
**Mentor:** Martin Kaltenbrunner
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
